permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins can update only when they are a manager member of the material supplier or a member of its broker; updates are denied if the material supplier is blank.
side_effects: Updates a material type record; triggers summary refresh after commit and refreshes cached generic material type names for generic types.
validation_notes: At least one field must be provided. name cannot include restricted characters : or tabs/newlines and may be immutable for reserved names. name and fully qualified name must be unique (generic types unique without a material supplier; supplier-specific unique per supplier). start-site-type must be JobSite or MaterialSite when provided. is-archived must be true/false. lbs-per-cubic-foot must be greater than 0 when provided. aggregate-gradation and aggregate-ecce must be between 0 and 100 when provided. If parent-material-type belongs to a material supplier, material-supplier must be set and match. If material-supplier is set, parent-material-type is required unless the server override flag is used. material-supplier cannot be changed once set unless a server override is used.

flags.name: --lbs-per-cubic-foot
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than 0.

flags.name: --material-supplier
flags.validation: Cannot be changed once set unless server override is used.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must not include : or tabs/newlines; reserved names may be immutable.

flags.name: --start-site-type
flags.validation: Must be JobSite or MaterialSite when provided.
